dcterms:description: The CVC-ClinicDB dataset consists of 612 frames containing polyps with image resolution 288 × 384 pixels, generated from 23 video sequences from 13 different patients using standard colonoscopy interventions with white light.
dcterms:title: CVC-ClinicDB

dcterms:creator: J. Staal
M. D. Abràmoff
M. Niemeijer
M. A. Viergever
B. Van Ginneken
dcterms:description: The DRIVE dataset consists of 40 coloured fundus photographs obtained from diabetic retinopathy screening in the Netherlands, captured using 8 bits per colour plane of resolution 768 × 584.
dcterms:title: DRIVE

dcterms:creator: M. H. Yap
G. Pons
J. Marti
S. Ganau
M. Sentis
R. Zwiggelaar
A. K. Davison
R. Marti
dcterms:description: The BUS2017 dataset consists of 163 ultrasound images and associated ground truth segmentations, with the mean image size being 760×570 pixels, collected from the UDIAT Diagnostic Centre of the Parc Taulí Corporation, Sabadell, Spain.
dcterms:title: Breast Ultrasound 2017 (BUS2017)

dcterms:creator: B. H. Menze
A. Jakab

dcterms:description: The BraTS20 dataset comprises 494 multimodal scans of patients with either low-grade glioma or high-grade glioblastoma, providing images for various MRI sequences.
dcterms:title: Brain Tumour Segmentation 2020 (BraTS20)

dcterms:creator: N. Heller
F. Isensee
K. H. Maier-Hein

dcterms:description: The KiTS19 dataset consists of 300 arterial phase abdominal CT scans from patients who underwent partial removal of the tumour and surrounding kidney or complete removal of the kidney including the tumour.
dcterms:title: Kidney Tumour Segmentation 2019 (KiTS19)
